channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investors Borrowed Like Crazy During the Rally. Now They're Paying the Price.
item.description: Behind the market tumult of the past month: the rapid unwind of several popular trades and the heavy use of leverage

item.title: The yen carry trade is a distraction. Stocks have more fundamental problems, says Morgan Stanley’s Wilson
item.description: Stocks have bigger problems than the yen carry trade says Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson

item.title: How Bank of America Ignores Its Own Rules to Prevent Dangerous Workloads
item.description: The death of a former Green Beret sparks an outcry about the all-nighters and 100-hour weeks that grind down young investment bankers.

item.title: When is the best time to do a Roth IRA conversion? Here’s how to make the most of this potentially tax-savvy move.
item.description: Converting to a Roth IRA isn’t for everyone, but people should know what the process entails, one expert told MarketWatch.

item.title: I'm 37 Years Old, and I Haven't Saved Nearly Enough for Retirement. What Do I Do?
item.description: Like so many millennials, I started saving late, and catching up hasn’t been easy.

item.title: ‘Everything I own is probably worth $500’: I am 72 with advanced kidney disease and live in a home for low-income seniors. Do I need to make a will?
item.description: “I’m giving everything to my two adult children equally, although I doubt they’ll keep anything.”

item.title: You Haven't Filed Your Tax Returns in Recent Years? The IRS Is Coming
item.description: The agency is particularly targeting people who made $400,000 or more in years in which they didn’t file a return.

item.title: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott have lowered the price of this SoCal mansion by nearly $6 million since 2022
item.description: It’s a 27% decrease from the original list price of $21.9 million two years ago for the swanky Beverly Hills estate.

item.title: Markets Might Have Recovered. Investors' Nerves Haven't.
item.description: Last week’s market panic could directly affect investor psychology, influencing whether the cracks we just saw turn into chasms.

item.title: 5-time Olympian Shaun White just sold his sweet mid-century modern home in L.A. for $3.9 million
item.description: This beautiful Los Angeles home has sweeping views of the city and an inviting pool.
